text: His mouth hardened, his eyes became steely. 'I see.' Scorn lashed his words. 'I wonder. you dared trust him to my care.' 'Nicholas -''Well! At least I know the truth. Truth! His gaze held hers masterfully. 'You wanted it so badly - at any price. I hope you are. satisfied.'
handwritten_text: His mouth hardened, his eyes became steely. 'I see.' Scorn lashed his words. 'I wonder. you dared trust him to my care.' 'Nicholas -''Well! At least I know the truth. Truth! His gaze held hers masterfully. 'You wanted it so badly - at any price. I hope you are. satisfied.'
